thread.section_title: Ace Ticket Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ace Ticket | www.aceticket.com
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text:
Had great experience speaking to a live person when I bought the tickets. I also bought passes for the Optum Field lounge which was amazing. Agent send I would be receiving, in a few minutes, a receipt and my tickets in two separate emails.
I got the receipt immediately but never received the tickets. Waited a few days and still no tickets. Called before my flight on Friday to Boston and they apologized and immediately sent the tickets. Problem acknowledged and corrected! Thanks ACE.
